"You probably don't want to do that and have Alli wake up and find herself half naked in your room." Then she added with a smirk, "Although that would be quite an interesting way to start her indoctrination."

"Oh, yeah. Right. But I need you to switch."

"Why should I, Wonderboy? You gave me this body and put me in it. I like it," Alli said jostling her boobs, causing your eyes to again fixate on them.

Wake up, stupid, your conscious cried, but it sounded like a faint whisper from across the room. Your hand slacked from the ring as Alli put on an sweet, innocently seductive smile. NO!

"Um, but please," you begged. "I'll do anything."

She gave you a pout putting her hands on her hips. "You should have watched what you were doing, but I guess I could move again, if ..."

That demonic grin again filled her face. You get a very uneasy feeling as her eyes measure your crotch like a succubus. After a few seconds she finishes.

"All you have to do is swear to me to do something for me for this 'inconvenience' that you have caused. I will leave this body for another. Just remember that if you swear that, then you must do it or will be forced to do it anyway."

Mara knew that it wouldn't take too much to keep corrupting Jake, especially how he fumbles into everything, like this. How easily it was for him to take his own sister. Jake was weak and already leaning to the perverted side that Mara knew so well. She would lead him until that was all he had and at the same time break Christine and Jake's innocent girlfriend, Alli. Jake was both blind to it happening and deeply lustful of the latter underneath his respectable facade. Mara knew all this because she had so much of Jake's deepest, darkest desires.

There's no way you want Mara in Alli, but you're unsure what devious scheme Mara will want you to perform. You didn't have to swear if it is too terrible; however, she had left you little choice.

"OK, what is it that you want?"

"As a partner, I'm not going to force you into one thing. I'll give you a choice and let you chose." She then held out one delightful breast as she told you, "I want you to ..."
